name: Catventure in Space - 8 Lives to Go
name_original: Catventure in Space - 8 Lives to Go
description:
"Cou the cat wants to become an astronaut and sneaks into a box of the space program. Unfortunately, her homemade space suit did not last and she ended up in heaven. But do not cats have nine lives?"

This game was solo made in one week for the 2019 Epic MegaJam.
It was the first game i ever made after selfteaching blueprints the past 6 months. Please let me know what you think about the game :)
